content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":71731,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とにかくこの世に生まれた以上、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Anyway, since it was born into this world,"},{"lineNumber":71732,"originalJapaneseLine":"　歓迎しないとね」","translatedEnglishLine":"we have to welcome it.\""},{"lineNumber":71733,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし、これからどうする？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But, what do we do from now on?"},{"lineNumber":71734,"originalJapaneseLine":"　赤子と一緒に置くのはさすがに不安だが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm uneasy about leaving it with the baby though...\""},{"lineNumber":71735,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうね。危険だから、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's right. Since it's dangerous,"},{"lineNumber":71736,"originalJapaneseLine":"　モンスター部屋に移しましょうか」","translatedEnglishLine":"let's move it to the monster room.\""},{"lineNumber":71737,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むーーーー……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mmmmmm..."},{"lineNumber":71738,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺と聖女モンスターのガキかぁ……","translatedEnglishLine":"A kid with me and the holy monster... huh..."},{"lineNumber":71739,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ぞっとせんなぁ」","translatedEnglishLine":"That gives me the chills.\""},{"lineNumber":71740,"originalJapaneseLine":"「諦めなさいな、パパ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Give it up, Daddy.\""},{"lineNumber":71741,"originalJapaneseLine":"「パパって言うな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don’t call me Daddy...\""},{"lineNumber":71742,"originalJapaneseLine":"こうして新世代を担うモンスターが","translatedEnglishLine":"Thus, a monster who would bear the next generation"},{"lineNumber":71743,"originalJapaneseLine":"この世に誕生した。","translatedEnglishLine":"was born into this world."},{"lineNumber":71744,"originalJapaneseLine":"世界一高い山、翔竜山――","translatedEnglishLine":"The world's highest mountain, Mount Shoryu—"},{"lineNumber":71745,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頂上――","translatedEnglishLine":"At its summit—"},{"lineNumber":71746,"originalJapaneseLine":"標高12000メートルの地点、","translatedEnglishLine":"at an elevation of 12,000 meters,"},{"lineNumber":71747,"originalJapaneseLine":"この世界で一番高い場所に、","translatedEnglishLine":"the highest place in this world,"},{"lineNumber":71748,"originalJapaneseLine":"一体の謎の存在がいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"there was a mysterious being."},{"lineNumber":71749,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とりゃ！　うにゃ！　にゃー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Toriyah! Unya! Meow!\""},{"lineNumber":71750,"originalJapaneseLine":"謎の存在――KDはバッバッとポーズを取っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The mysterious being—KD—was striking poses energetically."},{"lineNumber":71751,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とりゃりゃりゃりゃ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Toryaryaryarya!\""},{"lineNumber":71752,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どりゃあああああーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Doryaaaaaahhh!\""},{"lineNumber":71753,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":71754,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふいー、朝の体操終わりにゃ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Phew, morning exercise is done.\""},{"lineNumber":71755,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おっ、丁度朝日が昇るところにゃ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, just as the morning sun rises.\""},{"lineNumber":71756,"originalJapaneseLine":"「朝日さん、朝日さん、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mr. Morning Sun, Mr. Morning Sun,"},{"lineNumber":71757,"originalJapaneseLine":"　景気はどうかにゃ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"how's the economy doing?\""},{"lineNumber":71758,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ボチボチでんなー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So-so, I suppose.\""},{"lineNumber":71759,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほう、下界では人間と魔軍が戦争を？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh? Down below, humans and the demon army are at war?"},{"lineNumber":71760,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それは大変そうだにゃ」","translatedEnglishLine":"That sounds serious.\""},{"lineNumber":71761,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、おらには関係ないことにゃ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, that's nothing to do with me.\""},{"lineNumber":71762,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":71763,"originalJapaneseLine":"「暇だにゃー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm bored.\""},{"lineNumber":71764,"originalJapaneseLine":"「誰か訪ねてこないかにゃ？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I wonder if anyone will visit?"},{"lineNumber":71765,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もしも来たらこの黄金像を","translatedEnglishLine":"If anyone comes, I'll show them this golden statue."},{"lineNumber":71766,"originalJapaneseLine":"　見せてあげるのにゃ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll show it to them.\""},{"lineNumber":71767,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":71768,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふわぁ〜……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fuwaa~... (yawn)\""},{"lineNumber":71769,"originalJapaneseLine":"翔竜山の頂上で、KDはとても暇そうにしていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"At the summit of Mount Shoryu, KD looked very bored."},{"lineNumber":71770,"originalJapaneseLine":"生き物全てを拒絶するような極寒の地、氷雪地帯――","translatedEnglishLine":"A frigid land that rejects all living things, the ice and snow zone—"},{"lineNumber":71771,"originalJapaneseLine":"その最果てに、","translatedEnglishLine":"At its farthest edge,"},{"lineNumber":71772,"originalJapaneseLine":"ひっそりと塔が建っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"a tower stood quietly."},{"lineNumber":71773,"originalJapaneseLine":"ホ・ラガの塔――","translatedEnglishLine":"The Tower of Ho-Laga—"},{"lineNumber":71774,"originalJapaneseLine":"人々の噂にしか姿を現さない、謎の塔。","translatedEnglishLine":"a mysterious tower visible only in rumors among people."},{"lineNumber":71775,"originalJapaneseLine":"その中には、人目を避けるように、","translatedEnglishLine":"Inside it, as if avoiding attention,"},{"lineNumber":71776,"originalJapaneseLine":"一人の老人が静かに暮らしていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"an old man lived quietly."},{"lineNumber":71777,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふう、そろそろ日が落ちるか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Phew, it's about time for the sun to set...\""},{"lineNumber":71778,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hmm?\""},{"lineNumber":71779,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ばうっ、ばうっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Bau, bau!\" (barking sounds)"},{"lineNumber":71780,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よーぜふ、何を……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Joseph, what are you...\""},{"lineNumber":71781,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、やめなさい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, stop it."},{"lineNumber":71782,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その黄金像で遊んではいかん」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don’t play with that golden statue.\""},{"lineNumber":71783,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ばうっ、ばうっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Bau, bau!\""},{"lineNumber":71784,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まったく……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Really..."},{"lineNumber":71785,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前の玩具ならこの前作ってやったろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"I made you a toy just the other day, didn’t I?\""},{"lineNumber":71786,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ばうっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Bau!\""},{"lineNumber":71787,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これは世界の最奥に通じる大事な――」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This is an important item that leads to the world's depths—\""},{"lineNumber":71788,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……いや、よしておこう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...No, better not.\""},{"lineNumber":71789,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Phew...\""},{"lineNumber":71790,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さあ、よーぜふ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now then, Joseph."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とにかくこの世に生まれた以上、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Anyway, since it was born into this world,
"But, what do we do from now on?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 赤子と一緒に置くのはさすがに不安だが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm uneasy about leaving it with the baby though..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: モンスター部屋に移しましょうか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: let's move it to the monster room."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺と聖女モンスターのガキかぁ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A kid with me and the holy monster... huh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうして新世代を担うモンスターが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thus, a monster who would bear the next generation
The world's highest mountain, Mount Shoryu—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世界で一番高い場所に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the highest place in this world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一体の謎の存在がいた。
「とりゃ！　うにゃ！　にゃー！」
謎の存在――KDはバッバッとポーズを取っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The mysterious being—KD—was striking poses energetically.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふいー、朝の体操終わりにゃ」
「おっ、丁度朝日が昇るところにゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, just as the morning sun rises."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほう、下界では人間と魔軍が戦争を？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh? Down below, humans and the demon army are at war?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは大変そうだにゃ」
「ま、おらには関係ないことにゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, that's nothing to do with me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もしも来たらこの黄金像を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If anyone comes, I'll show them this golden statue.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翔竜山の頂上で、KDはとても暇そうにしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the summit of Mount Shoryu, KD looked very bored.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 生き物全てを拒絶するような極寒の地、氷雪地帯――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A frigid land that rejects all living things, the ice and snow zone—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひっそりと塔が建っていた。
人々の噂にしか姿を現さない、謎の塔。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a mysterious tower visible only in rumors among people.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その中には、人目を避けるように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside it, as if avoiding attention,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一人の老人が静かに暮らしていた。
「ふう、そろそろ日が落ちるか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Phew, it's about time for the sun to set..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その黄金像で遊んではいかん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don’t play with that golden statue."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前の玩具ならこの前作ってやったろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I made you a toy just the other day, didn’t I?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これは世界の最奥に通じる大事な――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is an important item that leads to the world's depths—"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とにかくこの世に生まれた以上、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Anyway, since it was born into this world,
"But, what do we do from now on?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 赤子と一緒に置くのはさすがに不安だが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm uneasy about leaving it with the baby though..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: モンスター部屋に移しましょうか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: let's move it to the monster room."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺と聖女モンスターのガキかぁ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A kid with me and the holy monster... huh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうして新世代を担うモンスターが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thus, a monster who would bear the next generation
The world's highest mountain, Mount Shoryu—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世界で一番高い場所に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the highest place in this world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一体の謎の存在がいた。
「とりゃ！　うにゃ！　にゃー！」
謎の存在――KDはバッバッとポーズを取っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The mysterious being—KD—was striking poses energetically.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふいー、朝の体操終わりにゃ」
「おっ、丁度朝日が昇るところにゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, just as the morning sun rises."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほう、下界では人間と魔軍が戦争を？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh? Down below, humans and the demon army are at war?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは大変そうだにゃ」
「ま、おらには関係ないことにゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, that's nothing to do with me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もしも来たらこの黄金像を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If anyone comes, I'll show them this golden statue.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翔竜山の頂上で、KDはとても暇そうにしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the summit of Mount Shoryu, KD looked very bored.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 生き物全てを拒絶するような極寒の地、氷雪地帯――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A frigid land that rejects all living things, the ice and snow zone—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひっそりと塔が建っていた。
人々の噂にしか姿を現さない、謎の塔。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a mysterious tower visible only in rumors among people.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その中には、人目を避けるように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside it, as if avoiding attention,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一人の老人が静かに暮らしていた。
「ふう、そろそろ日が落ちるか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Phew, it's about time for the sun to set..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その黄金像で遊んではいかん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don’t play with that golden statue."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前の玩具ならこの前作ってやったろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I made you a toy just the other day, didn’t I?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これは世界の最奥に通じる大事な――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is an important item that leads to the world's depths—"
